Other important and basic patterns that occur in Mathematics
are patterns of shapes. These shapes may be in one, two, or three
dimensions (1D, 2D, or 3D)

system_overview.difficulty_progression: Very Easy → Easy → Medium → Hard → Creative

mini_games.title: What are Patterns?
mini_games.learning_objective: Understand what patterns are in mathematics
mini_games.content_text: Patterns are everywhere in math! A pattern is something that repeats or follows a rule. Let's learn to spot them!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Click on objects that show patterns. Simple visual examples with everyday objects.
mini_games.success_criteria: Identify 3 out of 4 pattern examples correctly

mini_games.title: Meet the Shapes!
mini_games.learning_objective: Identify and name basic shapes: triangle, square, pentagon, hexagon
mini_games.content_text: Let's meet our shape friends! Each shape has a special number of sides. Triangle has 3, square has 4, and so on!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Drag shape names to match with the correct shapes. Interactive shape gallery with animations.
mini_games.next_screen_unlock: Match all shapes with their names

mini_games.title: Count the Sides!
mini_games.learning_objective: Count sides of polygons and understand the relationship between sides and shape names
mini_games.content_text: Every polygon has sides! Let's count them together. Triangle = 3 sides, Square = 4 sides. Can you count more?
mini_games.game_mechanics: Click on each side of a shape to count. Numbers appear as you click. Audio feedback for each count.
mini_games.success_criteria: Count sides correctly for 5 different polygons
mini_games.next_screen_unlock: Successfully count sides of all presented shapes

mini_games.title: Shape Trains!
mini_games.learning_objective: Recognize and continue simple shape sequences (triangle, square, triangle, square...)
mini_games.content_text: Shapes can make trains! Look at the pattern: triangle, square, triangle, square... What comes next?
mini_games.game_mechanics: Drag the correct shape to complete the train. Visual feedback with train animation when correct.

mini_games.title: The Polygon Family
mini_games.learning_objective: Learn names of polygons from triangle to decagon and their side counts
mini_games.content_text: Meet the Polygon Family! From Triangle (3 sides) to Decagon (10 sides). Each has a special name!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Build a family tree by placing polygons in order of side count. Interactive family portrait.
mini_games.success_criteria: Place all polygons in correct order from 3 to 10 sides

mini_games.title: Patterns That Grow!
mini_games.learning_objective: Understand how patterns can grow bigger (stacked squares, triangular numbers)
mini_games.content_text: Some patterns grow! Like building blocks getting taller, or triangles getting bigger. Let's build growing patterns!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Stack blocks to continue growing patterns. Drag and drop interface with snap-to-grid.
mini_games.next_screen_unlock: Successfully build all growing pattern challenges

mini_games.title: Pattern Detective!
mini_games.learning_objective: Identify and describe the rules that create different patterns
mini_games.content_text: Be a Pattern Detective! Look carefully at sequences and discover the secret rules that make them work!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Examine pattern clues and choose the correct rule from multiple choice options. Detective theme with magnifying glass.
mini_games.success_criteria: Solve 4 out of 5 pattern mysteries correctly
mini_games.next_screen_unlock: Solve the majority of pattern mysteries

mini_games.title: Pattern Creator!
mini_games.learning_objective: Create original patterns using learned concepts and explain the rules
mini_games.content_text: Now YOU are the Pattern Master! Create your own amazing patterns and challenge your friends!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Free-form pattern creation tool with shape palette. Save and share creations.
mini_games.success_criteria: Create and explain one original pattern
mini_games.next_screen_unlock: Create a valid pattern with explainable rule

mini_games.title: Amazing Fractals!
mini_games.learning_objective: Explore complex patterns like Koch Snowflake and understand self-similarity
mini_games.content_text: Some patterns are SUPER special! They repeat inside themselves forever. These are called fractals - nature's magic patterns!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Interactive fractal viewer with zoom controls. Click to explore different parts of the Koch Snowflake.
mini_games.success_criteria: Explore 3 different zoom levels of fractal patterns

mini_games.title: Pattern Master Challenge!
mini_games.learning_objective: Apply all learned concepts in a comprehensive challenge
mini_games.content_text: You've learned so much! Now prove you're a true Pattern Master by solving the ultimate pattern challenges!
mini_games.game_mechanics: Mixed challenges combining all previous concepts. Timed challenges with increasing difficulty.
mini_games.success_criteria: Score 80% or higher on mixed pattern challenges

MECHANICS: Click on objects that show patterns. Simple visual examples with everyday objects.

implementation_guide:
PROGRESSIVE LEARNING GAME SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE

OVERVIEW:
- 10 interconnected mini-games
- Progressive difficulty and concept building
- Each screen unlocks the next upon completion
- Comprehensive progress tracking across all screens

TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE:
1. Main Menu Screen: Shows progress and available screens
2. Individual Game Screens: Each is a separate HTML file or section
3. Progress Manager: Tracks completion and unlocks
4. Assessment System: Monitors learning effectiveness

SCREEN PROGRESSION:
1. What are Patterns? → Complete pattern identification task
2. Meet the Shapes! → Match all shapes with their names
3. Count the Sides! → Successfully count sides of all presented shapes
4. Shape Trains! → Complete all sequence trains correctly
5. The Polygon Family → Build complete polygon family tree
6. Patterns That Grow! → Successfully build all growing pattern challenges
7. Pattern Detective! → Solve the majority of pattern mysteries
8. Pattern Creator! → Create a valid pattern with explainable rule
9. Amazing Fractals! → Explore all fractal zoom levels
10. Pattern Master Challenge! → Achieve Pattern Master status

IMPLEMENTATION STEPS:
1. Generate each mini-game using the provided prompts
2. Create a main navigation system
3. Implement progress tracking with localStorage
4. Add unlock mechanics between screens
5. Create teacher dashboard for monitoring student progress

EDUCATIONAL EFFECTIVENESS:
- Each screen focuses on ONE concept
- Immediate feedback and encouragement
- Visual and interactive learning
- Progressive skill building
- Creative expression opportunities

ASSESSMENT INTEGRATION:
- Track time spent on each screen
- Monitor success rates and retry patterns
- Identify concepts that need reinforcement
- Generate progress reports for teachers
